sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-config-provider :theme="dark ? darkTheme : null" :theme-overrides="myTheme">
    <n-message-provider>
      <n-loading-bar-provider>
        <router-view></router-view>
      </n-loading-bar-provider>
    </n-message-provider>
    <n-global-style />
  </n-config-provider>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, provide } from 'vue'

import {
  NConfigProvider,
  NMessageProvider,
  darkTheme,
  NButton,
  NGlobalStyle,
  useLoadingBar
} from 'naive-ui'

import myTheme from './theme.js'

import { useRouter } from "vue-router";

const dark = ref(false)
// 向后代组件传递数据
provide('dark', dark)

// 进度条
const loadingBar = useLoadingBar();
const router = useRouter();
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  document.title = to.meta.title
  loadingBar.start();
  next();
});

router.afterEach(() => {
  loadingBar.finish();
});

</script>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App'
}

</script>

<style>

</style>
